00022 /**
00023  * @file   PmAdjusterFactory.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Tue Oct 25 11:56:37 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Factory class for making chip streams based on a string
00028  * representation.
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef _PMADJUSTERFACTORY_H_
00032 #define _PMADJUSTERFACTORY_H_
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include "chipstream/ChipLayout.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/PmAdjuster.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/PmOnlyAdjust.h"
00038 #include "chipstream/ProbeSet.h"
00039 #include "chipstream/SelfCreate.h"
00040 #include "chipstream/SelfDoc.h"
00041 //
00042 #include <cstring>
00043 #include <string>
00044 #include <vector>
00045 //
00046 
00047 /**
00048  * Factory class for making chip streams based on a string representation. 
00049  */
00050 class PmAdjusterFactory {
00051 
00052 public:
00053 
00054   /** 
00055    * @brief Constructor. Registers the objects we know how to create and how
00056    * they describe themselves.
00057    */  
00058   PmAdjusterFactory();
00059 
00060   /** 
00061    * @brief Create a pointer to a new PmAdjuster object as described
00062    * in the string specification.
00063    * @param spec - Specification string i.e. pm-gcbg
00064    * 
00065    * @return Pointer to new PmAdjuster objects, must be deleted when
00066    * finished.
00067    */
00068   PmAdjuster *adjusterForString(const std::string &spec);
00069 
00070   /** 
00071    * @brief Factory for creating PmAdjuster from string representation.
00072    * 
00073    * @param spec - Name of PmAdjuster.
00074    * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00075    * @return PmAdjuster requested.
00076    */
00077   PmAdjuster *pmAdjusterForString(const std::string &spec, ChipLayout &layout);
00078 
00079   /** 
00080    * @brief Factory for creating PmAdjuster from string representation.
00081    * 
00082    * @param spec - Name of PmAdjuster.
00083    * @param board - Blackboard with various state info
00084    * 
00085    * @return PmAdjuster requested.
00086    */
00087   PmAdjuster *pmAdjusterForString(const std::string &spec, PsBoard &board);
00088 
00089   /** 
00090    * Set the probes to be used as a background distribution.
00091    * @param controlProbes - probes to use as controls.
00092    */
00093   void setControlProbes(const std::vector<Probe *> controlProbes) {
00094     m_GcControlProbes = controlProbes;
00095   }
00096 
00097   /** 
00098    * Get the vector of documentation objects that this factory is aware of.
00099    * @return - vector of documentation objects.
00100    */
00101   std::vector<SelfDoc> getDocs() {
00102     return m_Docs;
00103   }
00104 
00105   /** 
00106    * Can this factory be used to build from this specification?
00107    * @param spec - Specification in form "chipstream.key=value.key=value"
00108    * @return true if this factory knows how to build from this specification, false otherwise
00109    */
00110   bool canBuild(const std::string &spec) {
00111     return SelfCreate::canMake(spec, m_Docs);
00112   }
00113   
00114 protected:
00115 
00116   /// Background probes to use. Note that memory is owned elsewhere.
00117   std::vector<Probe *> m_GcControlProbes;
00118   /// Self documentation
00119   std::vector<SelfDoc> m_Docs;
00120   /// Self creation
00121   std::vector<SelfCreate::selfCreator> m_Creators;
00122 
00123 };
00124 
00125 #endif /* _PMADJUSTERFACTORY_H_ */
